comments:
Decription:
Insert a image from resource folder, and insert a dataset to layout for preview. Error occurs.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a sample datasource, and a dataset with "select * from customers".
2.Pull the dataset to the layout. Insert a image from BIRT resource folder, which type is gif.
3.Error occurs when preview.

But when preview an image with dataset, no error occurs.
please see if the created report design is correct.

desinger create a report design as:

<image>
<expression name="uri">7EEA6B21CC1A9A6232E2630911CA0A8A.gif</expression>
</image>

The "7EEA6B21CC1A9A6232E2630911CA0A8A.gif" is not a valid expression.

This is a know limitation.
User need input valid expression.
User have to add "" to string expression.
*** Bug 133983 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 139351 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 139351 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
If add "" to image expression, the image in layout will be invalid. If you can provide a workaround to let them work both, it is acceptable.
*** Bug 139351 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

1. GUI will make the image can be previewd.
2. User need to add the "" explicit.

Correctly display image in layout or Image Builder preview pane when the image expression is enclosed with quote. 
If image uri is not a expression, it must enclosed with quote("), or it will throw engine exception in runtime. 
Fixed.
Since the image could be preview in report, the bug is not a smoke bug.
